resources.string: App data is used to help us improve the way our products work. This data is in anonymous form and is not connected with individual app users. You can learn more in our privacy policy and choose whether data from your app is collected for these purposes below.
The passwords you\'ve entered don\'t match
Help us create better products by sharing anonymous data about our app.
Please make sure you and your partner are both using the same app and have registered for an account.
If you or your partner cannot see the request, try again.
If the error persists, both sides should restart the app.
You are not able to search people by email anymore. Please search by username. You can find/change your username in the Account tab.
Usernames can only contain letters, numbers, underscores and dashes.
Failed to add - you are already friends with this user.
The alarm time must be later than the current time
You have received an alarm from %1$s, but you set the alarm to not play automatically and you can not play the alarm. You can turn on the auto-play alarm function for %2$s in the setting page
The other party missed your alarm clock
\"Remote\" doesn\'t have permission to use Bluetooth. You can change the app permissions in your phone’s security permissions.
\"Remote\" doesn\'t have permission to use the camera. You can change the app permissions in your phone’s security permissions.
\"Remote\" doesn\'t have permission. You can change the app permissions in your phone’s security permissions.
If you\'re using Android 6.0+, your GPS must be enabled to connect to Bluetooth devices.
Please turn on your phone\'s GPS.
Authorize us to log into your Spotify account and retrieve your music
Your device does not support Bluetooth 4.0
The %1$s was successfully sent but rejected by the receiver.
You\'ve missed the alarm because you had no toy connected.
The alarm set for %1$s went off successfuly at (%2$s)
Send personal message to partners when they miss an alarm
Notify me (within chat) when my partner misses an alarm
%1$s will receive the alarm after logging in.
%1$s just received the alarm set for %2$s
You missed an alarm from Lovense at %1$s. Please make sure your toy(s) is connected and turn on the \"auto-play\" settings by tapping the top right.
Your partner didn\'t receive your %1$s alarm
Your partner has no toy connected
You need to re-login to use these features.
Always play patterns automatically for this user
Do you want to resend this pattern?
You partner chose to automatically play your patterns
You chose to automatically play this person\'s patterns.You can tap the setting icon in the top right to change this setting.
Failed to recall the massage. Check network.
You cannot recall a message sent more than two minutes ago.
Waiting for %1$s to accept your request.
Are you sure you want to delete?
A new version of Lovense Remote is available, please update now.
This is not the correct file type. Please upload a .jpg, .gif, .bmp or .png file.
Unable to connect to the server
Network issue. Check or switch networks and retry.
Not connected to the internet. Please connect to wifi or your mobile network.

you receive a voice request from %1$s

Which toy do you want to sync?
Note: only Max/Nora can be synced.
The first synchronization control toy will be automatically selected in %1$s seconds.

A bug has caused the app to crash. This error was auto-logged and sent to our developers so they can find and fix the bug. If this continues, please contact our support at www.lovense.com/contact so we can get more info and get it resolved faster.
The upgrade was aborted. Please try again.
The toy is upgrading, do not exit or it will fail. Please wait for the upgrade to be complete.
Network connection issue. Unable to download the firmware update. Please reconnect.
The toy is low on battery. To make sure the upgrade is successful, please charge the toy to at least 50% battery.
The phone is low on battery. To make sure the upgrade is successful, please charge the phone to at least 40% battery.
The phone and toy are both on low battery. To make sure the upgrade is successful, please charge your toy to 50% and your phone to 40%.
Prepare to Upgrade. Please do not leave the current screen until the firmware update is complete.
Upgrade will start after rebooting. Please keep the toy close to your phone.
The light will quick-flash during the upgrade. Please do not leave the current screen and do not run the app in the background.
Please reboot both your toy and phone and try again.
Your toy has disconnected. Please reboot your toy and keep it close to your phone during the upgrade to ensure a stable connection.
Failed to download the firmware package. Please try again later
Failed to download the firmware package. Please check your network and ensure a stable connection during the upgrade.
No toy is detected. Please reboot your toy, keep it close to your phone and try again.
Please power on your toy to use the new firmware.
Your partner has requested to sync together...
Invites you to a video call.
Please review the images I submitted
You have an active control link that must be ended before using this feature. Would you like to end control link?
Let us know what you think or tell us about a broken feature.

Are you sure that you want to end the session?
This will make the previous links invalid. Are you sure you want to generate this control link?
Send this link to your partner
Enter a value between 0 and 60 (minutes) or between 0 and 120 (seconds).
Use 0 minutes for an unlimited amount of time.
Link will automatically expire after 30 minutes (if no one visits the URL)
Every link is unique and for one-time use. Do not visit the URL before sending it.

Due to app regulations, we\'ve had to change the way shared patterns work. All future pattern names will have to be approved by our team before they show up publicly.
Please do not post any words or phrases that can be interpreted as sexually explicit. If you do, we must remove it, or you put our app at risk of being removed from the app stores.

Lovense Remote notifications are disabled on your device. Please change your notification settings for this app.
Unable to initiate an audio call. Either the microphone is in use by another app, or you must change permissions to allow this app to use the microphone.
Unable to initiate a video call. Either the camera or microphone is in use by another app, or you must change permissions to allow this app to use the camera and microphone.
Microphone permissions must be allowed for the toy to vibrate according to the music. Go to settings.
The app does not have permissions to the microphone. The toy cannot vibrate according to the music.
For the toy to vibrate according to the music, please allow the app permissions to the microphone.

%1$s has been blocked. Do you want to unblock this user?
Lovense Remote requires an update to better support the newest mobile operating systems. To ensure proper functionality during video calls, please inform %1$s to update the app as soon as possible.
Lovense Remote requires an update to better support the newest mobile operating systems. To ensure proper functionality during voice calls, please inform %1$s to update the app as soon as possible.
Lovense Remote requires an update to better support the newest mobile operating systems. To ensure proper functionality during video calls, please update the app as soon as possible.
Lovense Remote requires an update to better support the newest mobile operating systems. To ensure proper functionality during voice calls, please update the app as soon as possible.
Switching modes is unavailable. %1$s must use the most recent mobile version of Lovense Remote.

Tap your toy icon to choose which toy controls all other toys.

Update failed. Please grant Lovense Remote permission to install apps from unknown sources or update the app through Google Play.

Your partner does not have a toy connected, please try again later.

Your new password cannot be the same as your current password!

At least one user needs to have a toy connected.
To sync patterns, you must agree to save patterns on Lovense servers. You can delete this data at any time by disabling sync.

Sync failed. Patterns will automatically attempt to sync again when you connect to a network.

Proceed to the model’s room and enjoy!
Connection established with the model. Keep the toy connected and prepare to control.

You may continue to wait for toy reconnection or switch to mouse control.

Please be aware that all text/voice messages and multimedia files you send will be stored on the recipient’s device and can be used in any way by the recipient. To ensure your security and privacy, please exercise appropriate caution and send messages at your own discretion.

Android 6.0 and above requires access to location permissions to connect Bluetooth devices. In order to connect your toys, please grant the app location permissions.
Due to your location permissions, your toys will be unable to reconnect when the app is running in the background. Please tap settings to change permissions.
Tap here to allow reconnection in the background.
In order for toys to be reconnected when Lovense Remote is running in the background, you must follow these instructions and choose “Allow all the time” for the location permission.
QR code will be valid for 7 days. A new QR code is generated each time you enter this page.
This group is full now. Unable to join.
This group has been disbanded. Unable to join.
This is a private group. You must be invited by the group admin.
Group QR code has expired. Please scan an updated code.
Group members can send you friend requests by default. If you want to disable this, please go to settings.
Failed to connect, please try again.
Your app version is too low to scan this QR code. Please update the app.

Enabling a security PIN is not required and is mostly targeted for more secure public play. \n\nThe security PIN is a secure way to connect your toy. Once enabled, malicious parties within physical Bluetooth range will be unable to hijack the toy\'s connection. If you set a security PIN, you must remember it in order to connect the toy to our apps.

Once enabled, all Lovense apps will require the security PIN in order to connect to this toy. This may complicate your user experience. \n\nIf you forget the security PIN for this toy, hold the toy\'s power button down for 10s to disable and erase the security PIN.

Security PIN has been set to %1$s . The PIN will be required when connected to an app for the first time.

Please remember this toy\'s PIN.
Please power the toy back on for the new setting to take effect.
Please make sure your toy is connected when you set the security PIN.
The security PIN is enabled for this toy. Connection may require you to enter the PIN in the next window. Please power on the toy before connecting.
Your security PIN may be required to connect to this toy. Enter it in the next window if necessary.
2. You have changed the security PIN.
If the PIN is invalid or forgotten, you may try the following solution.
1. Hold the toy\'s power button for 10s to disable security PIN connection. After 10s, the toy\'s light will quickly flash 3 times and the toy will power off.
2. Go to the your system’s Bluetooth manager, find your toy and forget/unpair it.
3. Reconnect the toy using this app. The security PIN will no longer be required.
You have disabled connecting this toy using a security PIN. Please follow the instructions below to unpair the device before attempting to reconnect.
You have changed/disabled the security PIN. Please follow the instructions below to unpair the device before attempting to reconnect.
You have disabled connecting this toy using a security PIN. \nPlease power the toy back on for the new setting to take effect.
To improve your account security, we request all our users to verify their email address. We sent an email to %1$s.
Please check your inbox and click on the link within 24 hours to complete your verification.
If you don’t see it, please check your spam folder or resend.
*A new email has been sent to your mailbox.

Create one or multiple alarms for your toy. When the alarm goes off, your toy will vibrate according to the selected pattern and duration that you choose. Patterns sent by users that you have saved will also appear here.

As of September 1, 2022, Spotify has discontinued support for third-party apps. Lovense Remote is no longer able to play Spotify music.
The app will follow your system’s settings.
